sql-item.sql:
select item_id,supplier_id,user_id,name,mobile,openid from ( SELECT DISTINCT il.item_id,supp.supplier_id, supp.user_id,supp.`name`,supp.mobile,supp.openid FROM ( select a.item_id,a.category_code,a.qualify_name_code,a.register_fund from ( select a.uid as item_id,qua.qualify_name_code, ifnull(con.register_fund,0) as register_fund,ca.category_code From b2b_bidding.bid_announcements a left join b2b_bidding.bid_ann_register_condition_qualify qua on qua.bid_announcement_uid=a.uid left JOIN b2b_bidding.bid_ann_register_condition con on a.uid=con.bid_announcement_uid inner join b2b_bidding.bid_announcement_categories ca on a.uid=ca.bid_announcement_uid WHERE a.created_time BETWEEN DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -20 MINUTE) and DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -10 MINUTE) and a.register_end_date>now() AND qua.bid_announcement_uid is null )a ) il INNER JOIN ( select a.supplier_id,ifnull(a.reg_capital,0) as reg_capital,b.category_code,u.user_id,u.`name`,r.mobile,w.openid from b2b_company.uuc_supplier_basic a INNER JOIN b2b_company.uuc_supplier_service_category b on a.supplier_id=b.supplier_id INNER JOIN b2b_user.uuc_user_identity ui on ui.company_id=a.supplier_id INNER join b2b_user.uuc_user u on ui.user_id=u.user_id and u.user_biz_type=1 left join b2b_user_business.business_card_record r on u.user_id=r.user_id left join ( SELECT wxa.userid,wxa.openid FROM m_yct.m_wx2ycguser wxa INNER join m_yct.zq_user zqu on wxa.openid=zqu.openid WHERE zqu.appid=@appId ) w on u.user_id=w.userid ) supp on il.category_code=supp.category_code and supp.reg_capital>=il.register_fund
union ALL
SELECT DISTINCT il.item_id,il.company_id as supplier_id, supp.user_id,supp.`name`,supp.mobile,supp.openid FROM ( select a.item_id,a.category_code,a.level_code,a.priority,a.qualify_name_code,a.register_fund,c.company_id from ( select a.uid as item_id,qua.qualify_name_code,lev.level_code, lev.priority, ifnull(con.register_fund,0) as register_fund,ca.category_code From b2b_bidding.bid_announcements a inner join b2b_bidding.bid_ann_register_condition_qualify qua on qua.bid_announcement_uid=a.uid inner JOIN b2b_parameter.bsp_qualification_level lev on qua.qualify_level_code = lev.level_code left JOIN b2b_bidding.bid_ann_register_condition con on a.uid=con.bid_announcement_uid inner join b2b_bidding.bid_announcement_categories ca on a.uid=ca.bid_announcement_uid WHERE a.created_time BETWEEN DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -20 MINUTE) and DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -10 MINUTE) and a.register_end_date>now() )a inner join b2b_parameter.bsp_qualification_level l on (a.qualify_name_code=l.qualification_code AND l.priority>=a.priority) inner join b2b_company.uuc_supplier_qualify_code c on (c.qualify_name_code=a.qualify_name_code AND c.qualify_level_code=a.level_code) ) il INNER JOIN ( select a.supplier_id,ifnull(a.reg_capital,0) as reg_capital,b.category_code,u.user_id,u.`name`,r.mobile,w.openid from b2b_company.uuc_supplier_basic a INNER JOIN b2b_company.uuc_supplier_service_category b on a.supplier_id=b.supplier_id INNER JOIN b2b_user.uuc_user_identity ui on ui.company_id=a.supplier_id INNER join b2b_user.uuc_user u on ui.user_id=u.user_id and u.user_biz_type=1 left join b2b_user_business.business_card_record r on u.user_id=r.user_id left join ( SELECT wxa.userid,wxa.openid FROM m_yct.m_wx2ycguser wxa INNER join m_yct.zq_user zqu on wxa.openid=zqu.openid WHERE zqu.appid=@appId ) w on u.user_id=w.userid ) supp on il.company_id =supp.supplier_id and il.category_code=supp.category_code and supp.reg_capital>=il.register_fund ) a GROUP BY user_id

sql-item.sql: select count(1) as is_area_fit from( select s1.supplier_id from ( SELECT DISTINCT a.bid_announcement_uid,b.supplier_id FROM b2b_bidding.bid_announcements_service_area a INNER JOIN ( select supplier_id,region_code From b2b_company.uuc_supplier_ser_area where region_code<>'china' and supplier_id=@supplier_id )b on (a.province_code=b.region_code or a.city_code=b.region_code) where a.bid_announcement_uid=@item_id )s1 left JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT a.bid_announcement_uid FROM b2b_bidding.bid_announcements_service_area a INNER JOIN ( select supplier_id,region_code From b2b_company.uuc_supplier_ser_area where region_code<>'china' and supplier_id=@supplier_id )b on (a.province_code=b.region_code or a.city_code=b.region_code) where b.region_code is null and a.bid_announcement_uid=@item_id ) s2 on s1.bid_announcement_uid=s2.bid_announcement_uid where s2.bid_announcement_uid is null union ALL select supplier_id from b2b_company.uuc_supplier_ser_area where region_code='china' and supplier_id=@supplier_id ) a

sql-item.sql: SELECT a.uid,a.title, case WHEN item.service_area='china' then '全国' ELSE area.item_name end as areaName, ( select CASE WHEN basq.province_code='china' THEN '全国' ELSE GROUP_CONCAT(IFNULL(area2.item_name,area1.item_name)) END from b2b_bidding.bid_announcements_service_area basq LEFT JOIN b2b_parameter.bizp_area area1 on area1.item_code=basq.province_code LEFT JOIN b2b_parameter.bizp_area area2 on area2.item_code=basq.city_code where basq.bid_announcement_uid=a.uid ) as serviceAreaName, if(ifnull(cond.project_count,0)=0 and ifnull(cond.register_fund,0)=0,'暂无', if(ifnull(cond.project_count,0)>0,concat('注资',cond.register_fund,'万元及以上，案例',cond.project_count,'个以上'),concat('注资',cond.register_fund,'万元及以上'))) as register_condition, bbf.category_name,ifnull(c.short_name,c.company_name) as company_name,ifnull(cond.register_fund,0) as register_fund, date_format(a.created_time,'%Y-%c-%e') as created_time, date_format(a.register_end_date,'%Y-%c-%e') as register_end_date, concat('http://m.mycaigou.com/bidding/detail-',a.uid,'.html?registerSource=zb-dx-xzts') as shortURL, concat(ifnull(c.short_name,c.company_name),bbf.category_name,'招标公告') as newTitle from b2b_bidding.bid_announcements a inner join b2b_bidding.bid_announcement_categories ca on a.uid=ca.bid_announcement_uid INNER JOIN b2b_parameter.bsp_basic_forest bbf on ca.category_code=bbf.category_code INNER JOIN b2b_bidding.bid_announcements_area item on a.uid=item.bid_announcement_uid left JOIN b2b_bidding.bid_ann_register_condition cond on a.uid=cond.bid_announcement_uid left join b2b_parameter.bizp_area area on area.item_code = item.service_area left join ( select uid as item_id from b2b_bidding.bid_announcements_register where supplier_id = @supplier_id and bid_announcement_uid=@item_id ) r on a.uid=r.item_id INNER JOIN b2b_company.uuc_developer c on a.developer_uid=c.developer_id left JOIN ( SELECT company_id,supplier_id FROM b2b_company.bid_developer_mysupplier a WHERE a.status = 3 AND a.is_del = 0 and supplier_id=@supplier_id ) black on c.developer_id=black.company_id where a.uid=@item_id and r.item_id is null AND c.company_name not like 'test_%' and black.company_id is null GROUP BY a.uid
